item.title: APACHE® KYUUBI BECOMES TOP-LEVEL PROJECT
item.description: ASF Blog - https://news.apache.org/foundation/entry/apache-kyuubi-becomes-top-level-project

item.title: New committer: Bowen Liang
item.description: The Project Management Committee (PMC) for Apache Kyuubi has invited Bowen Liang to become our committer and we are pleased to announce that he has accepted.

item.title: New committer: Kaifei Yi
item.description: The Project Management Committee (PMC) for Apache Kyuubi has invited Kaifei Yi to become our committer and we are pleased to announce that he has accepted.

item.title: ESTABLISH THE APACHE KYUUBI PROJECT
item.description: WHEREAS, the Board of Directors deems it to be in the best interests of the Foundation and consistent with the Foundation’s purpose to establish a Project Management Committee charged with the creation and maintenance of open-source software, for distribution at no charge to the public, related to a distributed and multi-tenant gateway to provide serverless SQL on data warehouses and lakehouses.

item.title: Top-Level Project Vote Pass!
item.description: The VOTE[1] for graduating Kyuubi from Apache Incubator as a Top-Level Project has passed with 13 binding +1 votes, 28 non-binding +1 votes, and no +0 or -1 votes.
